name: Bit Boy!!
description:
Get ready for the most spectacular journey through time in the history of video games!! Accompany Bit Boy Kubi through a crazy pixelated adventure and battle hordes of nasty monsters in:

4-bit dungeons,

8-bit caves,

16-bit strongholds,

32-bit labyrinths,

64-bit arenas and

128-bit worlds!!

Rescue Kubi's friends!!

Set off in the ultimate pursuit of fruits and highscores!!

Grab a friend for even more fun in Cooperative mode!!

The Wii Remote controller is your joystick - let the arcade adventure begin!!
